title: Luxury 2 Bedroom in Charlestown! No broker fee!
posting_body: ['Limited availability.', '**All pricing, specials and availability is subject to change at anytime with no warning or notice.', '**', 'No Broker Fee!!', 'All pricing is for 12 month leases.', '2 Bedroom 2 Bath $4270 1122 sqft', 'Amenities:', '2,000 S.F. Roof Deck w/ Stunning Zakim Bridge Views', 'Rooftop Outdoor BBQ + Alfresco Dining', 'Fitness + Cardio Center', 'Pet Friendly + Large Pets Welcome +', 'No Weight Limit', 'Hotel Inspired Lobby', 'Rooftop Outdoor Living Room', 'Outdoor Sundeck + Lounge', 'Views of Historic Charlestown + Bunker Hill', 'Boston City Skyline Views', 'Resident Club w/Communal Work/Dining Space', 'Resident Lounge with Media Viewing', 'Smart + Green + Smoke Free', 'Garage Parking', 'Adjacent to Whole Foods + Shopping + Dining', 'Walk to MBTA Orange Line to Downtown Boston', 'On-Site Maintenance', 'On-Site Management', 'Mid-Rise Elevator Building', 'Bike Racks', 'Package Concierge for Package Receiving', 'Apartment Features:', 'Condo-Quality Chefs Kitchen w/Prep Island + Stainless Appliances', 'High End Plank Flooring In Living/Dining Rooms and Kitchens', 'Select Homes Feature Private Balconies', 'Stunning City Views and Separate Home Office Space', 'Full-Sized Energy-Efficient Washer + Vented Dryer', 'Stainless Kitchen Appliances + Gas Range', 'Open Concept Living, Dining and Kitchen', 'Expansive Queen King and California King-Size Bedrooms', 'Spa Baths with Deep Steeping Bathtubs', 'Power Showers w/ Frameless Glass Doors', 'Luxurious Carpeting in the Bedrooms', 'Kohler Undermount Double-Sink Vanities and Quartz Counters', 'Walk-in Closets', 'Picture Windows', 'Condominium-Quality Fixtures and Lighting', 'Call Lawrence', 'Access Real Estate', '781-472-9707']
